title: Le Good Guys (LeGG)
body:
Recruiting for Le Good Guys.
There is a club purely for this team, makes communication between online and offline people easier.
Semi-serious team. 
I'm a mid/jungle main. Can play any role well. 
If you're interested, leave a comment or add me in game.
I don't mind about your rank, I'll probably have a normal or duo ranked with you before putting you in the team, just to see how you play and what your skill level is.
See you on the Rift.

replies.body:
Add me, Shyt

I probably can play tonight before 10 pm Melbourne/Sydney time.
After that someone borrowing my account.

As for main, i don't really main anything but Support and ADC is my best role.

Add me 
The Gingninj69
seems interesting
